transArray.content: Good service, clean rooms, great stay experience

Thank you for your affirmation and support. The store has the latest version of the brand's products, which supports self-service machine processing, which is efficient and fast; intelligent guest control in the room and small remote sensing; the lobby fragrance uses the brand's unique Longjing tea fragrance, which has a comfortable and pleasant smell. ;During the current epidemic, robot delivery is safe and efficient!
